PHRASE.LANG: Faster and faster he gains momentum, your living flesh is what he's hell bent on. Your singled out, he rushers right at ya! Dodge him quick as he pushes past ya! Turn, take aim, this ain't no game It's life or death with every breath. So show no mercy, he's not your brother! Knock him into touch, Slam Dunk that mother! [#Legal]
Le zombie de compagnie quarterback d'All Zombies Must Die! [#Legal]
Lo compagno zombi rusher di All Zombies Must Die! [#Legal]
El compañero zombi placador de All Zombies Must Die! [#Legal]
